channel.title: Databricks on Coding notes
channel.description: Recent content in Databricks on Coding notes

item.title: Databricks submit jar
item.description: Deploy jar file to azure databricks cluster from local. The idea is to push the fat jar to databrick’s dbfs using databricks CLI. Configure databricks CLI connection Generate and copy PAT token in databricks workspace/User Settings. Then go: databricks configure --token Workspace url: https://adb-3772194496043630.10.azuredatabricks.net/ Push jar file to databricks workspace First, pack to create the JAR cd [ProjectRoot] sbt assembly Then push the jar to Databricks. (Before, run rm to delete jar from databricks if it exists already).
